title: Ace IT
creator: Nordic Accessibility Group
description: Ace IT is a complete testing platform for your web sites and web projects. It features an automatic testing tool and guided manual testing that let´s you do complete accessibility reviews of your web sites. The free version let´s you use the automatic tool but not the guided, manual testing.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
